creator: epugh@upstate.com
text:
> I was writing some code and discovered that I was writing cell's out at
> column index -1..  This didn't seem to bother POI, but did tank Excel when I
> then tried to open it.  Should poi itself prevent negative indexs?  If not,
> I might add it to the HSSFCellUtil class to prevent silly mistakes.

Now submitting this as a bug.

creator: epugh@upstate.com
text:
Created attachment 3004
Fix for bounds checking on HSSFCell
(I nearly missed this 'cause it wasn't labeled patch)
creator: poi-support@buni.org
poi-support@buni.org
text: so it has been written, so it has been done... please cross check.  ;-)
